name: Darsel
headline: Chatbot teaching K12 math in developing countries
description: Darsel is a AI-powered math education chatbot which is designed to supplement K12 education systems in resource-constrained environments. Darsel allows students to practice math questions & do their homework through platforms like SMS, WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger.

founders.name: Abdulhamid Haidar, Founder
founders.description: MIT (Math, CS, Econ); McKinsey (3yrs, Middle East); Harvard (MPA International Development); Stanford (MBA)

### Learn math by Texting
Darsel is a **math learning chatbot** that uses AI to improve learning outcomes and reverse learning losses in low- and middle-income countries
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5eb716bf1e54267d65b89b93/fb5661e0-22fb-4bdd-83b8-507158064957/Darsel+Nigeria+-+101.jpg)
### **120,000+**
students
### **3**
curriculums
### **170,000,000+**
questions solved
**1 billion students** can’t reliably use video-based educational platforms due to device- and internet-related limitations. We reach them through **simple low-bandwidth channels** like SMS, WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger. 
Our platform provides a fully-automated **interactive and personalized learning** experience for students, and is powered by algorithms that were designed to **improve learning outcomes** and **reverse learning losses.**
Darsel is a **supplemental tool** for K12 school systems. All our content is **curriculum-aligned**. We partner with schools and **give math teachers data** on their students’ skills and needs.
We’re an EdTech **non-profit** that emerged from research at Harvard and Stanford. Want to help us **unlock human potential** in the world’s most resource-constrained communities?
[ Try Darsel ](http://darsel.tech/<https:/m.me/darseltech>)
Email us 
[ Donate ](http://darsel.tech/<https:/www.every.org/darsel?utmCampaign=donate-link#/donate>)
###  Why **Students** love darsel
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5eb716bf1e54267d65b89b93/1624981394736-0IDB4VKP9L0OFECPCDN8/4+Mobile+inbox-pana.png)
#### **SIMPLE**
Using Darsel is as easy as texting a friend, and it meets students where they are — on platforms like WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger. No apps to download. No passwords to remember. 
![5 Sent Message-pana.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5eb716bf1e54267d65b89b93/1624981424232-EY5PI3QBR8WKE8MOIW2Q/5+Sent+Message-pana.png)
#### **accessible**
Darsel can be accessed from any phone at any time. Darsel is text-based and requires little data (or none, in countries where SMS is available). No need to wait for a video to buffer. No need to pay for an expensive data package.
![6 Online test-pana.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5eb716bf1e54267d65b89b93/1624981312805-Y9ASJO53W7YV2W1WKTTL/6+Online+test-pana.png)
#### **Effective**
Darsel’s personalized learning algorithm automatically adapts to each student’s levels and provides hints and explanation to address learning gaps. It’s friendly, gamified, and engaging.
###  Why **Teachers** love darsel
![1 Mathematics-pana.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5eb716bf1e54267d65b89b93/1624979170990-8FSMDQ9D4WX9XRFM53L6/1+Mathematics-pana.png)
#### **content**
Our math library contains over 500,000 unique questions, hints and explanations — all aligned to the local curriculum. Teachers can also customize content or add their own.
![2 Data extraction-pana.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5eb716bf1e54267d65b89b93/1624979203018-74SS0KZHET9PNQ2WT1P5/2+Data+extraction-pana.png)
#### **analysis**
Our data reports provide insights about student skills, individually and at the classroom level. If a teacher assigns homework through Darsel, we take care of grading it. 
![3 Call center-pana.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5eb716bf1e54267d65b89b93/1624979239552-NU5NP7DKW31JQYIP7U1H/3+Call+center-pana.png)
#### **support**
We’re always a message away. Chatbots are great at helping students learn math, but our teacher support team is 100% human.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5eb716bf1e54267d65b89b93/1597195531388-U5JODWVT8SOPSLCNLS7B/Triangles+Background.png)
### Subscribe to our newsletter.
Sign up with your email address to receive news and updates.
Email Address
Sign Up
Thank you!
### Make a donation.
[ Donate ](http://darsel.tech/<https:/www.every.org/darsel?utmCampaign=donate-link#/donate>)
Join our mission to improve learning outcomes!

generated_description:
### Darsel: Revolutionizing Math Education in Developing Countries

**Overview:**  
Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's W22 batch, Darsel is a non-profit organization harnessing the power of AI to enhance math education for K12 students in developing countries. By providing a chat-based learning experience through widely-used messaging platforms like SMS, WhatsApp, and Facebook Messenger, Darsel makes quality education accessible to students in resource-constrained environments.

**Mission:**  
Darsel aims to tackle the challenges faced by over a billion students who can't reliably access traditional video-based educational platforms due to limited internet connectivity or device access. Their mission is clear: Utilize AI to reverse learning losses and significantly improve educational outcomes in low- and middle-income countries.

**Key Features:**
- **Accessibility:** The Darsel chatbot requires minimal data, making it usable on any mobile device, without the need for apps or extensive loading times. This level of accessibility ensures that even the most underserved students can engage with math content effectively.
- **Personalized Learning:** Darsel leverages AI algorithms to provide a tailored learning experience, adapting to each student’s unique skill level. This personalized approach includes hints, explanations, and feedback to bridge learning gaps.
- **Comprehensive Math Library:** With over 500,000 unique math questions aligned with local curriculums, Darsel supports teachers by providing data insights on student performance and automating homework grading.

**Current Impact:**
- **Engagement:** More than 120,000 students have interacted with Darsel, collectively solving over 170 million math questions.
- **Partnerships:** Darsel collaborates with educational institutions to equip teachers with valuable insights into their students' skills and needs, thus enhancing the overall learning environment.

**Team and Support:**  
Darsel operates with a compact team of five, driven by a passion for education. Their support system is both human and automated—ensuring students receive help when needed, while data-driven reporting empowers teachers to address classroom challenges effectively.

**Get Involved:**  
Whether you're an educator looking for innovative tools, a student eager to enhance your learning, or a supporter wanting to contribute to the cause, Darsel offers various avenues for engagement, including donations and partnerships.

Darsel isn't just another education tech initiative; it's a powerful step towards unlocking human potential in the world’s resource-limited communities. To learn more, visit [Darsel.tech](http://darsel.tech).
